attributes.action: Consider the Welsh Rugby Union 6 nations cup winners to be honoured in HM the Queen's New Years Honours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Welsh Rugby Union team won the 2008 six nations tournament without losing a game. Although this is not a World Cup, it is still an achievement and the team should be recognised in the Queens New Years honours list with whatever honour is deemed appropropriate, MBE, OBE, CBE, etc.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office ceremonial secretariat now deals with requests for honours. Visit http://www.honours.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
